sequence.title_popular: Take a position on the most popular proposals of the consultation '{{question}}' - Make.org

form.requirements: All fields are mandatory except for special information

messages.invalid_email: The e-mail format is not valid.
messages.invalid_email_dynamic: Please use the right e-mail format {{label}}.

messages.invalid_password: Your password must be at least 8-character long.

messages.invalid_privacy_policy: The privacy policy must be approved.
messages.malformed: Please use the right url format "https://example.com"

form.password_requirements: 8 characters minimum with at least 1 number, 1 upper case, and 1 special character.
form.post_code: The postcode allows us to analyse the results by geographical area.

common.display_tooltip: Display the content of the tooltip
common.expand_collapse: {{name}} - Display the content of the collapse section
common.shrink_collapse: {{name}} - Hide the content of the collapse section

notifications.bad_link: This link is not valid anymore.

secure_expired.first_sentence: We logged you out as we thought you were gone.
secure_expired.second_sentence: Log in again to keep voting and submitting your proposals.

session_expired.title: Inactivity time limit
session_expired.description: We logged you out and froze your session while you were inactive.

notifications.unexpected_error: We are encountering an error, please try again later.
notifications.network_error: Impossible to access the full content of our website because it looks like you are offline.

vote_only.message: Citizens have submitted many proposals since the beginning of the "{{title}}" consultation. We need your votes to make a difference between them. In the meantime we can't accept new proposals.

author.disclaimer:
This option does not require you to be logged in to your Make.org account.
However, your proposal will remain anonymous to other users.

confirmation.title: Thank you for the report!
confirmation.description: Our team will investigate it as soon as possible.

first_step.title: Automatic translation
first_step.text: The translations of the proposals are automatic. If you notice a mistake, please let us know!

intro_card.title: Thousands of citizens submit their proposals.
intro_card.description:
Give your opinion on these proposals and submit your own.
It will help us prioritize our actions and choose which issues to tackle.

final_card.title: Thank you for reacting to the proposals !
final_card.description: Keep voting to help us identify our priorities.
final_card.title_binding_mode: Thank you for reacting to the proposals and sharing some information with us!

push_proposal_card.title: Do you have a proposal you want to submit on this topic?
push_proposal_card.next-cta: Not yet, I prefer to keep voting for the moment

success.tooltip_description: Your proposal will be processed by our teams within 48 hours, in the meantime you can already find it in your profile.
success.activate: Confirm your email address in one click
success.link: to ensure the authenticity of your account. Click on the activation link that you received at : {{mail}}
success.question: Do you have a question? Please contact us at :

data_policy_modal.title: Updating our data policy
data_policy_modal.description: Make.org is committed to respecting your privacy every time you visit the website. To continue browsing while logged in to Make.org you must agree to our updated
data_policy_modal.consent: I accept the new data policy and I will be able to use my Make.org citizen space

data_policy_modal.refusal_description_second_part: , you will no longer be able to access your Make.org citizen space.

not_found.title: Error 404
not_found.description: We are sorry, the page requested doesn't exist.

legal_consent.title: Legal permission
legal_consent.subtitle: We need one of your parent's permission
legal_consent.description: We need both permissions to allow you to navigate on this website. Then, you will express yourself on our citizen plateform !
legal_consent.minor_consent: I agree Make.org to use my personal data.
legal_consent.parental_consent: As a representative of parental authority, I consent to the processing of my child personal data by Make.org.
legal_consent.privacy_policy_first_part: I agree that Make.org processes my personal data to participate and to be informed of the results according to the
legal_consent.make_protect: Make.org is committed to protecting your
legal_consent.opt_in: I agree to receive emails from Make.org to be updated on current and future consultations.
